definition: a genre of art dealing with the depiction of natural scenery, do landscape gardening
details:
noun
- a genre of art dealing with the depiction of natural scenery
= synonyms: landscape painting
- painting depicting an expanse of natural scenery
- an extensive mental viewpoint
= example: an extensive mental viewpoint
- an expanse of scenery that can be seen in a single view
verb
- do landscape gardening
= example: do landscape gardening
- embellish with plants
= example: embellish with plants
